trans-unit.source: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Archivia tutti i dati necessari per serializzare o deserializzare un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by objects with custom serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene utilizzata dagli oggetti con il comportamento di serializzazione personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method on either <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> or <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate> populates the SerializationInfo store with the name, type, and value of each piece of information it wants to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>uno metodo <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate>Popola l'archivio SerializationInfo con nome, tipo e il valore di ogni singola informazione da serializzare.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the appropriate function can extract this information.
trans-unit.target: Durante la deserializzazione, la funzione appropriata consente di estrarre queste informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Objects are added to the SerializationInfo store at serialization time using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A> methods and extracted from the SerializationInfo store at deserialization using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti vengono aggiunti all'archivio SerializationInfo al momento della serializzazione utilizzando il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A>metodi ed estratto dall'archivio SerializationInfo durante la deserializzazione utilizzando il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.GetValue%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AddValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about customizing serialization, see [Custom Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla serializzazione personalizzata, vedere [la serializzazione personalizzata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter> passed as the `converter` parameter converts data from its internal representation to the form the user requested.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter>passato come il `converter` parametro converte i dati dalla rappresentazione interna al formato richiesto dall'utente.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter>

trans-unit.source: The internal representation of the data within the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> depends on the formatter that created it.
trans-unit.target: La rappresentazione interna dei dati <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>dipende dal formattatore che ha creato tale</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto da serializzare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter"></xref> used during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter"> </xref> utilizzato durante la deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: type or converter is .
trans-unit.target: typeor converter is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto da serializzare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the object requires same token in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto richiede stesso token in attendibilità parziale.

trans-unit.source: Adds a Boolean value into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un valore booleano nel <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> archiviare.

trans-unit.source: If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice.
trans-unit.target: Se due valori vengono aggiunti con nomi che differiscono solo per caso, verrà generata alcuna eccezione, che non è una procedura consigliata.

trans-unit.source: However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, l'aggiunta di due valori con lo stesso nome comporterà la <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>generata.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# void ISerializable.GetObject(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) { // This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", true); info.AddValue("abc", false); // However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", true); info.AddValue("XYZ", false); } ``` ```vb# Private Sub GetObjectData(ByVal info As SerializationInfo, _ ByVal context As StreamingContext) ' This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", "upper case") info.AddValue("abc", "lower case") ' However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") End Sub ```
trans-unit.target: Per esempio:```c# void ISerializable.GetObject(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) { // This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", true); info.AddValue("abc", false); // However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", true); info.AddValue("XYZ", false); } ``` ```vb# Private Sub GetObjectData(ByVal info As SerializationInfo, _ ByVal context As StreamingContext) ' This will not cause an exception to be thrown. info.AddValue("ABC", "upper case") info.AddValue("abc", "lower case") ' However, this will cause the SerializationException to be thrown. info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") info.AddValue("XYZ", "same case") End Sub ```

trans-unit.source: If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice.

trans-unit.source: However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, l'aggiunta di due valori con lo stesso nome comporterà la <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>generata.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>

trans-unit.source: The assigned type is always the type of the object, or one of its parents.

trans-unit.source: The assembly name contains the name of the assembly, version, culture, and some security information about the object.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'assembly contiene il nome dell'assembly, versione, impostazioni cultura e alcune informazioni di sicurezza sull'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Users who are changing the type being serialized (for example, to send a proxy for a particular type) will set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Gli utenti che modificano il tipo serializzato (ad esempio, per inviare un proxy per un tipo specifico) verranno impostato il valore di questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not use this property during deserialization because the value of this property is undefined.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un valore di <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> archiviare.

trans-unit.source: If the data stored in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> is of the type requested (or one of its derived classes), that value is returned directly.
trans-unit.target: Se i dati archiviati nel <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>è del tipo richiesto (o una delle relative classi derivate), tale valore viene restituito direttamente.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to convert it to the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per convertire i dati nel tipo appropriato.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatterConverter.Convert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the GetValue method can always be safely cast to the type specified in the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito dal metodo GetValue può sempre essere eseguire il cast nel tipo specificato di `type` parametro.

trans-unit.source: The name associated with the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Il nome associato al valore da recuperare.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>del valore da recuperare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: Se il valore archiviato non può essere convertito in questo tipo, il sistema genererà un <xref:System.InvalidCastException>.</xref:System.InvalidCastException>

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il tipo dell'oggetto da serializzare.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di oggetto da serializzare.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto da serializzare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> is responsible for setting the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> instance before passing it to <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>È responsabile dell'impostazione la <xref:System.Type>dell' <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>istanza prima di passarlo al <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>

trans-unit.source: However, users who want to send proxies for their objects will need to change the type represented by this <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, gli utenti che desiderano inviare proxy per i relativi oggetti saranno necessario modificare il tipo rappresentato da questo <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>istanza.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Using the SetType method is equivalent to setting both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando il metodo SetType equivale a impostare entrambi gli <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo.FullTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto da serializzare.</xref:System.Type>
